name: Poke-Inspired Bowl
description: Poke bowls are traditionally served using raw tuna. This recipe uses canned tuna so you can enjoy this dish any time of the year— even if you do not have access to fresh tuna.
preparation: In a Round or Multipurpose Steamer, add rice and water; cook on high for 8–10 min.
While rice is cooking, combine sauce ingredients in a small bowl. Set aside.
Assemble 4 bowls with rice, veggies and tuna. Serve with sauce and hot sauce, if desired. Enjoy!
